Engine and take a look at the viewport.
Okay. Inside of Unreal Engine, if you
hover your mouse over the viewport and
hold down the right mouse button, you
can then move your mouse to look around.
You can also use W to go forward, S to
go backwards, A to go left, and D to go
right. Just standard WD controls, just
like a video game to move around. In the
top right hand corner, you can also
change the camera speed. So, if it feels
like you're going too fast or too slow,
you can change this. You can do this by
going over to the camera icon in the
top. And then you can see we have got

one. Let's say I want to go a little bit

I can move around a little bit easier. I
would definitely recommend you adjust

point that is comfortable for you.
Moving on to some more viewport
controls. If you use the scroll wheel,

With this, you can see I've now got a

Moving on from there, now let's take a
